title: Seinfeld Goes Online, But Who Will Watch?
teaser: Hulu is now streaming all nine seasons of the classic '90s sitcom, but will it hold up to a younger online viewing audience?
contentencoded:
Today, all nine seasons of “Seinfeld” will be available for the first time streaming online. But will reruns of the show, which went off the air over 15 years ago, hold up to a younger online viewing audience? NPR TV Critic Eric Deggans joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to talk about this, as well as his favorite Seinfeld episodes.

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweetsÂ @Deggans.
